mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user( username, password, email, phone, create_time, update_time ) VALUES( #{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, email, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, phone FROM user

SELECT id,username From user
username like CONCAT('%',#{username},'%')
SELECT id, username, password, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, email, phone FROM user WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id,username FROM user ORDER BY id desc
SELECT id,username FROM user ORDER BY create_time desc
